indicator-declaration.display-name: Percentage of trips taken by bike or walked

indicator-documentation.definition: This indicator gives a ratio of the number of trips walked or biked to the total number of trips taken overall.
indicator-documentation.interpreting-results: Please see How Modeled for information on interpreting the results from this indicator.
indicator-documentation.principal-uses: This indicator is useful for both evaluative and diagnostic purposes.
indicator-documentation.specification: The total number of walk and bike trips taken over a year is divided by the total number of trips taken that year.
